text: allahanu jivagalannu avugala maranada vele vasapadisikolluttane. Mattu mrtavagada jivagalannu avanu, avugala niddeya veleyalli vasapadisikolluttane â€“ a paiki maranavu vidhisalpattiruva jivavannu matra avanu tadedittu kolluttane hagu itara jivagalannu ondu nirdista avadhigagi maralisuttane. Cintisuva janarige idaralli khandita pathagalive
